Hi everyone, 

I stumbled over yet another problem in my last crawl.

The s=
eed in question this time:
http://www.einsiedler-forsttechnik.de

This URL =
yields a HTTP 302 response and redirects me to:
http://www.forsttechnik-ein=
siedler.de

Now my problem is, that even though I have a AcceptRootRedirect=
s rule
in my DecidingScope, this URL isn't added to the seeds - thus not
cr=
awled at all.

Once again I'm asking myself if my expectations are wrong or=
 if
heritrix is doing something wrong.

Thanks in advance
